long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Works in tandem with the macOS app "Hermes - Quick Access" to give you quick access to specific tabs and apps!

Allows the Hermes app to jump to any important tab simply by pressing a hotkey. Doesn't matter if you are in a Zoom call, working on some art on Photoshop or anywhere else, just press the hotkey and it will jump to Chrome and open the correct tab for you.
